titleInfo.title: Front Entrance of General Rose Memorial Hospital

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 10 x 8 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on envelope: ''#568 1973 Allied Jewish Federation Campaign''. On back of photograph: ''Front Entrance to Rose Hospital...Mrs. Opal Farnsworth, Director of Nursing Service, wheeling patient into Hospital''.

mods.abstract: The front entrance of Rose Memorial Hospital in Denver, Colorado. Nurse Opal Farnsworth is pushing a male patient in a wheelchair into the front entrance.

titleInfo.title: Beck Archives Photograph Collection, Health Care and Philanthropy

mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
